data.message: Layer 6 architecture fixes - move intent to user boundary, fix args hashing, entropy, audit chain: Fixed 5 architectural issues: (1) intent minting moved from call_tool to on_user_message with user_turn_id tracking, (2) _intent_id excluded from args_hash via INTERNAL_ARG_KEYS set, (3) secrets.token_hex(8) for proper 64-bit entropy, (4) verified vault_id == source_id is canonical, (5) added full audit chain: issued→consumed→blocked→wrapped. Committed as 1b9c3d9.
data.task: Layer 6 architecture fixes - move intent to user boundary, fix args hashing, entropy, audit chain
data.outcome: Fixed 5 architectural issues: (1) intent minting moved from call_tool to on_user_message with user_turn_id tracking, (2) _intent_id excluded from args_hash via INTERNAL_ARG_KEYS set, (3) secrets.token_hex(8) for proper 64-bit entropy, (4) verified vault_id == source_id is canonical, (5) added full audit chain: issued→consumed→blocked→wrapped. Committed as 1b9c3d9.
